personalInfo.name: Ashil Poojary
personalInfo.title: Full Stack Developer
personalInfo.summary: Full Stack Developer with 2.4+ years of experience in building scalable backend systems and interactive frontends. Skilled in Go, Node.js, React, Angular, Docker, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. Passionate about clean architecture, infrastructure, and solving complex backend challenges.

education.college: St. Aloysius Institute of Management & IT

achievements: Working in a fast-paced startup environment, allowing me to take ownership of projects and explore a wide range of technologies
Delivered multiple client requirements end-to-end, including planning, development, and deployment
Trained and led a team of junior developers to build and deliver core modules on time
Collaborated closely with stakeholders and product owners, managing tasks and sprints using JIRA
Contributed to enterprise systems for Carl Zeiss, including an order booking platform and complaint management system
Spearheaded the containerization of all internal projects using Docker and streamlined CI/CD pipelines
Built robust backend services and user-friendly frontends using Go, Node.js, React, and Angular
Built responsive interfaces and improved UI/UX for ongoing projects
Supported backend team with Node.js integration and debugging
Gained hands-on experience with Agile development and CI/CD pipelines

projects.title: Carl Zeiss - Order Booking System
projects.description: Handled the complete order module including discount calculation and invoice generation for customers. Automated monthly billing and reporting workflows, reducing manual effort by the business team.

projects.title: Carl Zeiss - Complaint Management System
projects.description: Built a complaint registration and resolution tracking platform for client support teams. Implemented modules for complaint lifecycle, engineer assignment, and ticket resolution tracking.

projects.title: Containerized Environment Platform
projects.description: Architected and implemented a Docker-based platform to provision remote Linux/macOS environments. Developed backend services using Go for container orchestration and SSH access.

projects.title: Legal Conflict Resolve Management System
projects.description: Designed and built the entire frontend using React.js and Redux. Collaborated with backend team using Spring Boot APIs. Ensured seamless integration and responsive performance.

projects.title: Driving School Management System
projects.description: Built both frontend and backend using the MERN stack. Developed features for class scheduling, payment tracking, and reporting. Optimized MongoDB queries for performance.
